name: Check Account Status
description: Check if the status still active.

name: Check Zone Limit
description: Check the number of active sessions for current zone. If reached limit, then disallow access

name: Check MAC Address
description: Check if the device MAC address registered to the account.

name: Register MAC Address
description: Auto register MAC address to the account and disallow other device to login using the same account.

name: Check Allowable Zone
description: Check if the device allow to login using the current zone.

name: Check Account Credit
description: Check if the account still have credit to access internet.

name: Check Account Quota
description: Check the current quota that has been used, and total allowed quota.

name: Check Simultaneous Use
description: Check how many active sessions using the same account. If reached limit, then no more device allow to login.

name: Send to PMS Payment
description: Post charges to PMS system if the account login for the first time.

name: Generate Invoice
description: Generate invoice once the user perform login for the first time.

name: OTP Change Password
description: Change password of the user so that the same credential can only login once.

name: Check Concurrent User
description: Check how many user can login each tenant. If reached limit, then no more device allow to login.
